title: Drawing, "Drawing for Trees 9, D10, and D11", 2011
medium: Graphite on white paper mounted on white paper
signed: Signed in graphite, lower left: Andrea Branzi 2011
provenance: Andrea Branzi; Friedman Benda Gallery until February 2013
creditline: Gift of Marc Benda and Barry Friedman, courtesy of the artist
description: Three designs depicted. Upper right: a tree against a large rectangular banner with stripes; lower right: a tree with several disks growing out the side contained within a frame; left center: four trees of various sizes, each with disks growing from them contained within a frame. Some orange crayon markings.
